name: @bitcoinerlab/ledger
description: This package serves as an internal package for use by other packages within the `@bitcoinerlab` organization. It provides an alias for the Ledger Bitcoin TypeScript client. All credit for the underlying technology and functionality should be attributed to Ledger, the company behind the product.

scripts.sync_package_dependencies: jq --argjson deps "$(cat bitcoin_client_js/package.json | jq '.dependencies')" '.dependencies += $deps' package.json > package.json.new && mv package.json.new package.json
scripts.tmp_README:
mv README.md /tmp && echo "# Ledger Bitcoin TypeScript Client Alias for @bitcoinerlab

This package serves as an internal package for use by other packages within the `@bitcoinerlab` organization. It provides an alias for the Ledger Bitcoin TypeScript client. All credit for the underlying technology and functionality should be attributed to Ledger, the company behind the product.

**Note**: This package can be replaced with the official `ledger-bitcoin` npm package once [this PR](https://github.com/LedgerHQ/app-bitcoin-new/pull/147) is published to npm (likely in version > 0.2.1)." > README.md
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run tmp_README && npm run sync_package_dependencies && cd bitcoin_client_js && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run build
